awards:
第34届新加坡国际电影节(2023)
　　银屏奖 最佳亚洲剧情长片(提名) 里亚尔·里萨尔迪

director.name: 里亚尔·里萨尔迪 Riar Rizaldi

introduction: Several professional actors and non-actor professionals portray a dynamic of human-nature relationship in one of the most active stratovolcano in the world, Mount Merapi. In the shadows of recent eruptions, these actors play a story that is written together with a volcanologist, sand miner, and a mystic–people who have a close bond with the mountain–potentially illustrating fiction and nonfiction situations that could and would have happened in Merapi.源自：https://ffd.or.id/en/film/monisme/
